name: Mexican Fiesta Bites
author: lutzflcat
summary: If you're a Mexican food fan, I think you'll like this one.  A great start to a Mexican Fiesta or Cinco de Mayo celebration, game night appetizer, or even an after-school snack for the kids.  It's a creamy, one-bite hors d'oeuvre packed with fresh flavor.
ingredients: 12 each Original Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®
1 teaspoon taco seasoning mix, or to taste
1 tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste
1 tablespoon shredded Cheddar cheese, or to taste
directions: Smooth about a teaspoon of refried beans over the top of the Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®
Add a layer of guacamole, then salsa, and a dollop of sour cream
Top with some chopped tomatoes, a sprinkle of chopped cilantro, and Cheddar cheese
Place an olive slice on the top
